comments: Jean-Marie Géhu departed 15 February 2014. Source: Biondi, E. (2014): The loss of Jean-Marie Géhu. - Plant Sociology, Vol. 15, No. 1, June 2014, p. 3-4
examples: Salicornia dolichostachya Moss var. nidiformis (D.König) Géhu, Caron & Franck ex J.Duvign. Nouv. Fl. Belgique, Luxembourg, N. France et Rég. vois. (ed. 3) 922 (1983).
source: Contr. Bot. Univ. "Babes-Bolyai" Cluj-Napoca, 45: 101-102 (2010), incl. portr.
